description: Michelle Rhee, chancellor of public schools in Washington D.C., made big education news this week by announcing a new contract […]
contentencoded: Michelle Rhee, chancellor of public schools in Washington D.C., made big education news this week by announcing a new contract proposal that D.C. has finally negotiated with the leaders of its teachers’ union.
